title: GM 's research and development expenditures 2015 to 2019
summary: The statistic shows the forecast GM of Expenditures billion development from 2015 to 2019 .
The GM of Expenditures billion is forecast to grow 6.8 billion in 2018 .
gold: General Motors incurred around 6.8 billion U.S. dollars in R & D costs in 2019.
This figure puts the car manufacturer 's R & D intensity at five percent.
That said , the company declared interest to enter into cost sharing arrangements with third parties .
